Contract Validation process Cc NonPrivilegedpst Chris Attached is the contract validation process put together by Erin Let me know if you have any questions Brett Miller KPMG LLP Information Risk Management Louisiana Houston Texas Office Fax Mobile Email

CSC Contract RPS Matrix Cc NonPrivilegedpst Attached is a matrix of our discussion from Tuesday where we described the result of finding contracts in each of the different areas ie CSC Avista RPS or the paper contract In the original version of this table CSC and Avista were separated based on an assumption that there should be feeds between the two systems After the meeting at on this assumption was changed such that CSC and Avista are both sources of billing usage data Please call me at if you have any questions Brett Miller KPMG LLP Information Risk Management Louisiana Houston Texas Office Fax Mobile Email

Baseline Bandwidth Cc NonPrivilegedpst Chris as discussed this morning attached is the scope document This mornings meeting has helped in defining the types of calculations reports that will be needed in the database Outcomes from the meeting are Verify transaction economics for newer contracts Power Baseline team to compile data so that you can get an indication on the number of contracts that have baseline information for California Data relating to material change will be captured and we will attempt to identify trends in the data captured Process flow to be prepared for baseline bandwidth capture Items that we are waiting on from you are Confirmation that we will be basing calculations for bandwidth on Project Ranger data Copy of some sample MDMA data for use in constructing the database Confirmation of the scope described in the attached document Call me if you have any questions at Regards Brett Miller KPMG LLP Information Risk Management Louisiana Houston Texas Office Fax Mobile Email
